code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Slide=_ref=>{let{content,type}=_ref;if(type==='about'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-96 h-[28rem] p-6 bg-slate-800 rounded-lg shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-white mb-4",children:content.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-48 w-full mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:content.imageSrc||"/api/placeholder/400/225",alt:content.title,className:"w-full h-full object-cover rounded"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-300 text-base overflow-y-auto max-h-48",children:content.description})]});}if(type==='skills'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-96 h-[28rem] flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4 bg-slate-800 rounded-lg shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-16 h-16 mb-2 flex items-center justify-center",children:content.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-white text-lg font-medium",children:content.name})]});}return null;};export default Slide;
